rooms.description: Open-plan living and dining area with a built-in library niche along one wall
Open-plan kitchen adjoining the living-dining area, with access to an outdoor patio for fresh air, designed according to Vastu guidelines
Master bedroom on ground floor with attached ensuite bathroom; strategically placed in the north-east corner per Vastu recommendations
Second bedroom positioned towards the west side for privacy and better lighting

openings.details: Main entrance leading into a small foyer with a waiting area, designed to harness auspicious energy as per Vastu
Large window facing the garden for natural light in living-dining area
Door connecting kitchen to dining area, ensuring fluid circulation
